summary: A mysterious man attempts to save "The Dark Side of Tokyo" from the control of a land-hungry corporation.
cast: Akio Ôtsuka|Hideyuki Hori|Kotono Mitsuishi|Kôichi Yamadera|Masako Katsuki|Maya Okamoto|Akira Natsuki|Nozomu Sasaki|Keizo Horiuchi|Hiroshi Yanaka|Maki Kachisa|Jon Avner|Scott Cargle|Stacia Crawford|Dan Green|Matthew Harrington|Kathleen Kern|Rachael Lillis|Rachel Nanstad|Peter Patrikios
keywords: resistance group|blues music|based on comic book|long haired male|tokyo japan
title: Dâkusaido burûsu
